forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a gentle crispness, hinting at the typical marine layer that cloaks the evening sky. Although the clouds hover with a mysterious grace, tonight’s conditions remain agreeable—mostly cloudy, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable 57 degrees. The west-southwest wind whispers softly, tempering the warmth of the day, a perfect invitation to wrap yourself in a light jacket as you step out. 

Tomorrow promises a refreshing change; the sun will peek through, illuminating the city with a warm embrace. Expect mostly sunny skies with a high around 67, the cool morning giving way to a pleasantly mild afternoon. Dress in layers to savor the transition—a lightweight sweater or long-sleeve shirt will serve you well. With the wind picking up, the city offers ample opportunity for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a cozy café visit, perfect for indulgent pastries and an equally indulgent moment. The charm of the city in late summer offers the ideal backdrop to appreciate yet another day steeped in San Francisco's unique allure.
